title: [Epidemiology] There were approximately 14.83 million excess deaths associated with COVID-19 across the world from 2020 to 2021, according to estimates by the WHO reported in Nature. This estimate is nearly three times the number of deaths reported to have been caused by COVID-19 over the same period.
[Health] From COVID-19 to the common cold: UBC scientists identify broadly effective, infection-halting compound
